articles.title: Star Wars movies and TV shows: Every project and release date announced
articles.description: Here’s the official Star Wars movie and TV release calendar schedule through 2026, with every new and upcoming Star Wars project, where to watch it, and when it will be released.
articles.content: Star Wars is in an interesting place. Multiple movies have been delayed or canceled after the mixed response to Rise of Skywalker in 2019 and Solo: A Star Wars Story the year before. Since then, most… [+6760 chars]

articles.title: The 61 Best Movies on Disney+ Right Now (August 2024)
articles.description: “The Beach Boys,” “Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour (Taylor’s Version),” and “Fantastic Mr. Fox” are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Disney+ this month.
articles.content: In the game known as the streaming wars, Disney+ came out swinging, bringing with it a massive library of movies and TV showswith new ones being added all the time. Watched everything on Netflix? Dis… [+38487 chars]

articles.author: Collier Jennings
articles.title: Best Action Movies on Netflix Right Now (September 2022) - IGN
articles.description: These are the best action movies on Netflix right now -- blockbusters, fight films, animated adventures and shootouts galore.
articles.content: There is nothing like a good action movie on Netflix. The perfectly choreographed fight scenes that let you feel every punch and kick on screen; the shootouts that see bullets and bodies hitting the … [+11394 chars]
